Package com.intellij.codeInspection

Interface CommonProblemDescriptor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DomCollectionProblemDescriptor, DomElementProblemDescriptor, DomElementResolveProblemDescriptor, ModuleProblemDescriptor, ProblemDescriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonProblemDescriptorImpl, DomCollectionProblemDescriptorImpl, DomElementProblemDescriptorImpl, FormElementProblemDescriptor, ModuleProblemDescriptorImpl, ProblemDescriptorBase, ProblemDescriptorImpl, ProblemDescriptorWithReporterName, ResourceBundleEditorProblemDescriptor

    public interface CommonProblemDescriptor
    Base class for problems returned by local and global inspection tools.
    See Also:
    InspectionManager.createProblemDescriptor(String, QuickFix[])

    • Method Detail

      • getDescriptionTemplate

        java.lang.String getDescriptionTemplate()
        Returns the template (text or HTML) from which the problem description is built.

        The template may contain special markers:

        • #ref is replaced with the text of the element in which the problem has been found
        • #loc is replaced with the filename and line number in exported inspection results and ignored when viewing within IDE
        • #treeend is used as cut-symbol for template when it's shown inside inspection result tree. So any content after this marker is not visible in the tree node.
        Returns:
        the template for the problem description.

      • getFixes

        QuickFix [] getFixes()
        Returns the quickfixes for the problem.
        Returns:
        the list of quickfixes registered for the problem.
